g.title: Sample template to bring up an Auto Scaling group running an application deployed via Opscode Chef solo. This template is a building block template, designed to be called from a parent template. A WaitCondition is used to hold up the stack creation until the application is deployed. **WARNING** This template creates one or more Amazon EC2 instances and CloudWatch alarms. You will be billed for the AWS resources used if you create a stack from this template.
